channel.title: Work on Josh Dover
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Josh Dover

item.title: What Working At Elastic Has Been Like
item.description: I really enjoyed Patrick McKenzie’s post on working at Stripe and wanted to share my experience at Elastic in a similar fashion. I joined Elastic last summer to make understanding large data sets for non-devs easier, mostly by making developing on Kibana simpler. I made the move to Elastic after a 3 year stint at a small eCommerce startup in Austin, called Cratejoy. There I had been managing a medium-sized engineering team.
